analysis.key_quote: This reclassification will not make the government work better. It will make it easier to fire government workers, damaging them unfairly and depriving the public of their services, while undermining the public trust in the government.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about unfair treatment of government workers and the potential loss of public trust, which aligns with themes of due process and politicization.
